verses.name: Matthew 17:5
verses.text: While he yet spake, behold, a bright cloud overshadowed them: and behold a voice out of the cloud, which said, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased; hear ye him.

verses.name: Matthew 17:6
verses.text: And when the disciples heard it, they fell on their face, and were sore afraid.

verses.name: Matthew 17:7
verses.text: And Jesus came and touched them, and said, Arise, and be not afraid.

verses.name: Matthew 17:8
verses.text: And when they had lifted up their eyes, they saw no man, save Jesus only.
